name: A Hero's Tale Demo
description:
A Hero's Tale is a top-down JRPG made using RPG Maker MV, and it is about a Hero that is on a mission to investigate strange activities that have been happening on an island. The guild has sent you on your very first mission as a Hero. Throughout your journey, you will encounter many difficult trials and challenges.  You have about 7 days before the island is entirely consumed, so you will need to manage your time and resources carefully. 

This game is actually a demo of an older game called Project Dragon.  I wanted to redesign the entire game from the ground up, starting from this demo. With addition of multiple design changes as well as a newer artwork, the game is definitely looking a lot better!
